software.name: Acid Attack
software.Description: Acid Attack is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Acid and published by Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Action Pack Vol. 1
software.Description: Action Pack Vol. 1 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Akira
software.Description: Akira is an Action game, developed and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Alfred Chicken
software.Description: Oh no! The evil Meka-Chickens have eggnapped Billy Egg and his brothers for their terrible cloning experiment! And they've taken Floella too! This is no yolk. As the worlds only chicken with a bionic beak, Alfred is whisked off to a multitude of bizarre lands to pluch his friends from the clutches of their foul captors. Scramble through 11 transdimensional levels 'acing the likes of Byron Snail, Mag-Mine, Grim Blocker and the Terrasawus. Beat the Meka-Chickens, snatch back the eggs, and lay their plans for world domination to rest!

software.name: Alien Breed '92 SE & Qwak
software.Description: Alien Breed '92 SE & Qwak is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Alien Breed 3D
software.Description: Over the last four years, the Alien Breed saga has become legendary amongst Amiga owners... now the series culminates in quie spectacular fashion... Alien Breed is now in 3D! Transported to spectacular 3D environment, you must outwit the ferocious Breed once more, but this time the added dimension of "being there" brings you even closer to the disgusting creatures than ever before!

software.name: Alien Breed: Tower Assault
software.Description: In the depths of space a holocaust has occured. Intelligent and hostile alien life-forms have taken over the Military Research Unit in the planet Azarin 2E. Chaos and destruction have been wrought on the innocent colonists. Now it's your job to reclaim the station for humankind. Travel through the tractless voids of space, then endure over 65 levels of Alien blasting mayhem. Watch your ammunition and energy levels in preparation for the showdown with the Alien Queen.

software.name: Amiga CD Football
software.Description: Amiga CD Football is a Sports game, developed and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Amiga CD32
software.Description: Amiga CD32 is a Hardware game, developed and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Arabian Nights
software.Description: Sinbad Junior works for the "fair and just" Caliph as an apprentice gardener tending to his incredibly excessive palace gardens. Today however he gazes upon another beautiful flower - the Princess Laila as she stands on a balcony high above the gardens. Away in an eerie floating castle dark deeds are at hand. The evil Vizier, in his dastardly plan to rule the kingdom, has despatched a demon from the nether regions of hell to kidnap the princess and cast a mighty spell over the kingdom. As Sinbad stares up at the balcony a dark shape descends from the sky, mauling and clawing at Laila. Laila screams and the demon lifts off clutching the beautiful princess. Sinbad makes a desperate leap to grab the claw of the monster, but is left on the balcony flat on his back. As the demon disappears into the clouds Sinbad is surrounded by the Caliph's guards and hurled into prison on a charge of sorcery. Now, taking on the role of Sinbad Junior, you not only have to escape the palace dungeons, but also rescure Laila from the evil Vizier.

software.name: Arcade Pool
software.Description: Rack'em-up and shoot for glory in this stunning Pool Simulator featuring superb ball animation and authentic sounds that have been digitised to give you a greater feel.

software.name: ATR: All Terrain Racing
software.Description: ATR: All Terrain Racing is a Racing game, developed and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Banshee
software.Description: Take a classic arcade game. Add a whole heap of seasoning in the form of stylish, state-of-the-art graphics and four MASSIVE levels of up-to-date action. Stir in an Alternative Dimension, exquisitely evil aliens and a heavy-sprinkling of mucho-big guns 'n' power-propped planes. Leave to simmer on an incandescent heat and wait for the best BLAST in light years.

software.name: Base Jumpers
software.Description: Base Jumpers is an Action game, developed by Shadow Software and published by Rasputin, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Battle Chess
software.Description: There is a darkness over the battlefield. The wind sighs gently and there, in the distance, comes the flash of lightning and the rumble of thunder. With a sudden gust of wind; your warriors appear: the King, the Queen, two each of Bishops, Knights and Rooks, and before them all, a row of Pawns. Waiting, your King turns to you, ready to order his servants forward to their deaths in your battle to rule the field.

software.name: Battletoads
software.Description: Okay 'toad! Let's get even! When the evil Dark Queen kidnaps your best buddy, Pimple, and the best looking Princess this side of the Mazallion Star Cluster - what are you gonna do about it? Are you gonna cry? Hide? Call the Starcops? No way! Because you're a BATTLETOAD and BATTLETOADS don't cry, hide or call for help. BATTLETOADS get real MAD - and then they get EVEN! So strap on your Blaster, power-up the Toadster and take a flying leap to the Dark Queen's planet - but, watch out 'toad - the lady's bad and she's got a whole mess of nasty suprises lined up for you - like the Psyko Pigs, the Mutant Ratpack, Robo-Manus and the Saturn Toadtrap to name a few. You're gonna need all your fighting skills to defeat her - the Battletoad Butt, the Big Bad Boot and the Nuclear Knuckles, if you're gonna rescue your friends and get the frog outta there with your green skin intact!

software.name: Beavers
software.Description: Beavers features stunning cartoon-quality graphics with 18 huge, eight-way scrolling levels and intricate and involving puzzles which require quick thinking to solve. Also features a great soundtrack and sampled cartoon sound effects!

software.name: Beneath a Steel Sky
software.Description: Beneath a Steel Sky is a gripping science fiction thriller set in a bleak vision of the future. Robert Foster is an innocent outsider stranded in a vast city where oppressed civilians live and work in soaring tower blocks... while the corrupt, covetous and rich lie underground, shielded from all polution. Alone, save for a robot circuit board, Foster must fight for survival... and discover the sinister truth behind his abduction.

software.name: Benefactor
software.Description: Benefactor is an Action game, developed by Digital Illusions and published by Psygnosis, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Big 6, The
software.Description: The Big 6 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Codemasters, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Black Viper
software.Description: Black Viper is a Simulation game, developed by Light Shock and published by neo Software, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Brian The Lion
software.Description: Brian The Lion is an Action game, developed by Reflections Interactive and published by Psygnosis, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Brutal Football
software.Description: Brutal Football is a Sports game, developed by Teque Interactive and published by Millennium, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Brutal: Paws Of Fury
software.Description: Across the world, invitations were delivered. Under the watchful eye of the great master Dali Llama, the worlds greatest martial artists would return to a place they knew well.. Brutal Island. Each will use their own unique mental and physical martial arts style and training in a tournament to prove the worlds one true champion.

software.name: Bubba 'n' Stix
software.Description: Our goofy hero and his friend - an intelligent alien stick - have crash-landed on a weird planet after being captured by an alien spacecraft. In order to get back to Earth, Bubba must use Stix in a variety of different ways to solve puzzles, overcome adversaries and foil the comedic attempts of his kidnapper to recapture him in this multi-directional scrolling puzzle.

software.name: Bubble And Squeak
software.Description: Bubble And Squeak is an Action game, developed and published by Audiogenic Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Bump 'n' Burn
software.Description: The speed! The thrills! The spills! Glory goes to those who survive the ultimate racing experience - The Bump N Burn Championships!

software.name: Camel Racer
software.Description: Camel Racer is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by MMMGroup, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Cannon Fodder
software.Description: "Don't wait 'til you see the whites of their eyes... Don't kid yourself it will be over by Christmas... Don't try to shut out the screams... And don't forget to wash your hand afterwards..."

software.name: Castles II: Siege & Conquest
software.Description: Castles II: Siege & Conquest is a Strategy game, developed by Almathera Systems and published by Interplay, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Chambers of Shaolin
software.Description: Chambers of Shaolin is an Action game, developed by Thalion and published by Unique Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Chaos Engine 2, The
software.Description: The Chaos Engine 2 is an Action Adventure game, developed by The Bitmap Brothers and published by Renegade, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Chaos Engine, The
software.Description: Sometime during the last century, an experimenter with time, space and early computers created a bizarre machine. The inventor's name was Baron Fortesque. The machine was... The Chaos Engine. Although primitive, the machine became incredible powerful and went crazy, turning ordinary humans and household pets into razor toothed, armour-plated killing machines. Enter 6 hard-nailed mercenaries for hire. These ball-breakers are armed to the teeth with over 25 weapons and a host of special destructive devices specific to their class. Select 2 characters to form your party and enter the World of Chaos. The sprawling adventure covers 4 graphic worlds and 16 levels loaded with fiendish traps, puzzles and secret passages. Get your hands on sawn-off shotguns, molotov cocktails and a huge amount of armament, and buy, blag or blast your way through hordes of different monsters to do battle with the ultimate killing machine, THE CHAOS ENGINE!

software.name: Chuck Rock
software.Description: Chuck Rock hasn't been the same since his long-time rival in love, the evil Gary Gritter, kidnapped his wife, the beautiful Ophelia. Help Chuck in his quest to rescure Ophelia from the clutches of the evil Gary. Kick, throw rocks and belly-butt your way through a multitude of comical zones featuring 500 screens of exciting and addictive gameplay.

software.name: Chuck Rock II: Son of Chuck
software.Description: Eighteen months after his victory over Gary Gritter, Chuck Rock is now the owner of the hugely successful "Chuck Motors" and has become a father. Kidnapped by his evil enemy Brick Jagger, Chuck Rock is likely to become Chuck Dust, unless somebody rescues him... A sudden crash as Chuck Junior bursts from his play pen "Goo Goo Gaa Gaa, I'll be back."

Release.name: Chuck Rock II: Son of Chuck

ReleaseImages.Image: Chuck Rock II Son of Chuck (EU)-102841_front.jpg
Chuck Rock II Son of Chuck (EU)-102841_back.jpg
Chuck Rock II Son of Chuck (EU)-102841_side.jpg

software.name: Classic Lotus Trilogy
software.Description: Classic Lotus Trilogy is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Magnetic Fields and published by Gremlin Graphics, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Clockwiser
software.Description: Clockwiser is a Puzzle game, developed by Team Hoi and published by Rasputin Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Clue!, The
software.Description: The Clue! is a Strategy game, developed by neo Software and published by Kompart, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Critical Zone
software.Description: Critical Zone is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: D/Generation
software.Description: A secret project is out of control at a biotech researh lab. The building in total chaos, the security system clasting everything that moves. All the employees have been killed or trapped. You must now battle the ominous force - an organism which uses virtual reality to actually become the chair you are sitting on, the floor you are walking on, even the room you are standing in! It's a race against time with ingenuity and determination your only weapon.

software.name: Dangerous Streets
software.Description: The Greatest Fighters on Earth are here, ready to do battle with bruising agility, that will blow your mind. Take on the 8 Mighty Challengers, each having their own unique deathly winning Special Moves. Only the very meanest can survive on the Dangerous Streets of this urban jungle.

software.name: Dangerous Streets / Wing Commander
software.Description: Dangerous Streets / Wing Commander is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Mindscape Inc. and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Dark Seed
software.Description: Darkseed is based upon the fantastic artwork of swiss surrealist H.R. Giger, the inspiration for such blockbusters as Alien, Alien 3 and Poltergeist II. Giger has revolutionised the look of Science Fiction forever with his unique "biomechanical" style which depicts the synthesis of technology and biology as they might evolve without the influence of man. Challenge your mind... You are Mike Dawson, a Science Fiction writer who just purchased an old victorian house. As you explore your new home, you soon discover that you have bought more than you bargain for. Control the fate of two worlds... The world as we know it and the dark world of an ancient and dying civilisation. Unlock the secret of a sinister plot and discover the dark passage to their world... A place more terrifying than your darkest nightmare. Time is running out... You are on a collision course with destiny and only you have the ability to save yourself and the world from a cruel and inhuman fate. Every decision may be your last, so choose wisely... All of humanity is depending on you.

software.name: Death Mask
software.Description: Battle and blast away might, nasty, awesome aliens, deadly demonic monsters and vicious mercenaries in level after level of adrenalin pumping action packed with excitement. Find and use a vast arsenal of powerful weapons and ammunition hidden in huge labyrinths of correidors and secret rooms. Play solo or against a "friend" using the unique two player mode. Can you get him before he gets you? Or will you help each other on this bloody quest?

software.name: Deep Core
software.Description: Deep Core is an Action game, developed by Dynafield and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Defender Of The Crown II
software.Description: Defender Of The Crown II is a Strategy game, developed by Master Designer and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Dennis
software.Description: Dennis is an Action game, developed by Citizen Software and published by Ocean, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Der Clou!
software.Description: The Clue! is a Strategy game, developed by neo Software and published by Kompart, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Diggers
software.Description: Diggers is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Millenium Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Disposable Hero
software.Description: Disposable Hero's highly addictive gameplay features five huge levels of bombing and blasting action as well as 32 different weapons available to choose from. Stunning graphics and animation with great special effects and an original soundtrack. Countless aliens to blast through, just waiting for you!

software.name: Donk! The Samurai Duck!
software.Description: Donk! The Samurai Duck! is an Action game, developed by The Hidden and published by Global Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Dragonstone
software.Description: Cut a path through Agon's demonic hordes and explore vast, forgotten lands as you play the hero in this fantasy role-playing adventure, set in a top-down, multi-directional perspective across seven externsive levels. A mystery with a twist in the dragon's tail...

software.name: Emerald Mines
software.Description: Emerald Mines is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Almathera Systems, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Exile
software.Description: Become Sadler the desert warrior as he travels the known world in search of the precious Holimax! Join forces with Rumi, Kindi, and Fakhyle to piece together the puzzle that will allow you to find the Holimax and use it to overthrow the ruthless Klispin Crusaders! But keep your cool! In this quest, you'll have to trudge through waist deep snow, jump through haunted forests, plan a jailbreak, slink through creepy towerse, and defeat terrifying monsters if you're going to get anywhere! Hurry! There is only one Holimax, and the enemy forces are closing in!

software.name: Fears
software.Description: Have you got what it takes to face your Fears? Everyone said it couldn't be done. It has been! Prepare to meet thy doom across 30 levels of Manyk mayhem! An awesome display of 360 degree 3D action. Six different weapon systems and three levels of difficulty - Easy, Normal and Difficult. The Level Designer allows you to create your own fields of battle!

software.name: Fields of Glory
software.Description: Fields of Glory is a Strategy game, developed by WJS Design and published by MicroProse, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Fightin' Spirit
software.Description: Fightin' Spirit is an Action game, developed by Light Shock and published by neo Software, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Final Gate
software.Description: Final Gate is an Action game, developed and published by Alternative Software, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Fire & Ice
software.Description: Fire & Ice is an Action game, developed by Graftgold and published by Renegade, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Fire Force
software.Description: Fire Force is an Action game, developed and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Flink
software.Description: Disaster strikes Imagica Island and Wicked Wainwright's taken over! He's kidnapped the four island leaders, separated them, and has them under the watchful eyes of the Demon Guardians. Excited by his newfound control, he's gone absolutely crazy! He's casting dark clouds of smoke across the land, bringing unpleasant weather and much sadness to the people of Imagica. In a huge panic, the islanders appoint Flink, an apprentice wizard, to challenge Wicked Wainwright and to force the Demon Guardians to release the island leaders. Locate the leaders, bring their powers together, and help make Flink the full-fledged wizard he's always wanted to be!

software.name: Fly Harder
software.Description: Fly Harder is an Action game, developed by Starbyte and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Frontier: Elite II
software.Description: The most eagerly awaited sequel to date, FRONTIER pitches you far, far into the future to the year 3200. Civilizations have spread through the galaxy hundreds of light years from Earth in all directions. Vast areas of the galaxy remain unexplored and with many thousands of worlds now settled in the cosmos, a rich and varied life of adventure awaits. Take on the role of a space trader known to moonlight as an intergalactic mercenary and watch the universe unfold before your very eyes.

software.name: Fury of the Furries
software.Description: During the unsuccesful voyage of the rebel Timies to the Earth, an evil Timy had captured the king and got held of the marvellous machine, turning Sidroughinto a planet of terror! Now that they have returned to their planet, these small hairy enimals have repaired their natural abilities. They can swim (above and below water), throw balls of fire, use a rope (to move about and grab objects) and even cut some elements of the scenery! Only by using your lightning reactions and crafty intelligence to the full can you guide the Timies through over a hundred levels of their astonishing planet.

software.name: Gamers' Delight
software.Description: Gamers' Delight is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Schatztruhe, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Gangster Pursuit
software.Description: Gangster Pursuit is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by MMMGroup, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Global Effect
software.Description: Make the decisions of a world leader as you control the balance of nature versus civilisation. Power-up and expand cities to rival those of Mother Earth, but watch out for global warming pollution, encroaching desert and deforestation. Destroy the enemy that trieds to blast your cities and poison your planet. The world is in your hands - take control!

software.name: Gloom
software.Description: Sure, Gloom features the hottest 'you are there' 3-D graphics around - the most disturbingly realistic sound effects - the hugest army of bizarre and bloodthirsty creatures yet assembled in one game. But none of that really matters when a game is this much sheer fun to play!

software.name: Grandslam Gamer Gold Collection
software.Description: Grandslam Gamer Gold Collection is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Grandslam, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Guardian
software.Description: Guardian is an Action game, developed by Acid Software and published by Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Gulp!
software.Description: Gulp! is a Puzzle game, developed and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Gunship 2000
software.Description: Gunship 2000 puts you in the pilot's seat of a modern helicopter gunship, flying across a visually accurate topographical 3-D world. This is your chance to battle through two massive combat theatres and to undertake missions that will test your leadership skills to the full. Ultimately, you'll command five choppers - you choose the type, you choose the weapons, you choose the crew and you give the orders - as mission after mission is mercilessly thrown at you in vast military Campaigns. Gunship 2000 - with full training, decorations and career promotions, this is the ultimate combat helicopter simulation.

software.name: Heimdall 2
software.Description: The evil Loki and his ravaging Hakrat Hordes will soon become too powerful for resistance. It is time for the Gods to intervene before all is lost. Play the role of Heindall and sacrifice your divinity as you return to the six vast Viking lands known as Yggdrasil in a quest to recover the pieces of the Sacred Amulet and stop Loki dead in his tracks.

software.name: HeroQuest II: Legacy of Sorasil
software.Description: HeroQuest II: Legacy of Sorasil is a Strategy game, developed and published by Gremlin Graphics, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Humans 1 and 2
software.Description: Humans 1 and 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Imagitec Design, Inc. and published by GameTek, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Humans III: Evolution Lost In Time
software.Description: Humans III: Evolution Lost In Time is a Puzzle game, developed by Imagitec Design, Inc. and published by GameTek, which was released in Europe in 1996.

Release.name: Humans III: Evolution Lost In Time

ReleaseImages.Image: Humans III Evolution Lost In Time (EU)-4296_front.jpg
Humans III Evolution Lost In Time (EU)-4296_back.jpg

software.name: Impossible Mission 2025: The Special Edition
software.Description: Impossible Mission 2025: The Special Edition is an Action game, developed and published by MicroProse, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Insight Dinosaurs
software.Description: Insight Dinosaurs is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Optonica, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Insight Technology
software.Description: Insight Technology is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Optonica and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: International Karate +
software.Description:
Vibrant visuals and super sounds provide a backdrop to thrilling one or two player action unlike any other game of its type. And if you think two combatents isn't enough there is a third computer controlled opponent that will get you sweating.
Your vast range of moves include killer kicks, pulverising punches, heavy weight headbutt, flying kick, devastating split kick manoeuver and the spectacular back flip. All at a pace that will leave you breathless.

software.name: International Open Golf Championship
software.Description: International Open Golf Championship is a Sports game, developed by RISC and published by Ocean, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: James Pond 2: RoboCod
software.Description: Dr. Maybe's dangerously fishy plans for world domination continue. In a slimy effort to sabotage the world's largest toy factory, he has planted penguin-bombs in toy factories inside the North Pole. James Pond bubbles to the rescue as RoboCod in another massive oceanic adventure! Featuring a massive play area - over 2,500 colorful screens of action-packed gameplay; 8 enormous levels, each with lots of sections; Discover many bonus rooms; Amazing gravity impetus super-scroll!

software.name: James Pond 3: Operation Starfi5h
software.Description: The sinister Dr. Maybe is back and only our slickest Special Agent, James Pond, can stop him. Special Agent Finnius Frog can help you get to those hard to reach places with his powerful jumping abilities. Explore more than 100 levels of outrageous fun! Win using an ocean of FI5H gadgets: suction boots, the fruit gun, X-ray specs, a thruster unit, spring boots and a clever fruit suit disguise. Use a special FI5H rocket pack to defeat Dr. Maybe! Fry over 40 different enemies under Dr. Maybe's control and avoid Maybe's mounted guns and missile launchers!

software.name: Jetstrike
software.Description: Fasten your seatbelts and get ready to play JETSTRIKE - the number one flight action game from Rasputin. This special CD32 version contains: Amazing new 24-bit graphics; A simplified control system (so anyone can play); A huge, specially composed CD soundtrack; Nearly 200 missions, many unique to this version; Multiplayer option for between 2 and 8 opponents; Over 60 different aircraft to choose from; 60 weapons systems (there's even a nuclear bomb!) Altogether, one of the biggest games that you'll ever play on your CD32!

software.name: John Barnes European Football
software.Description: John Barnes European Football is a Sports game, developed and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Jungle Strike
software.Description: Now the storm hits the jungle! The Desert Madman is dead - now his vicious son plots a nuclear strike against the U.S.A. He's enlisted a powerful ally - a ruthless South American Drug Lord with an army of hi-tech mercenaries. It's YOUR mission to take them out! Turn night into day with your explosions on a deadly night mission. Penetrate the Drug Lord's air defenses in an F-117A Stealth fighter. Stalk the terrorists from the streets of Washington D.C. to the deadly jungles, rivers and snow-covered peaks of South America! Stunning cinematics and digitized sound effects create a spectacular movie-like experience!

software.name: Kid Chaos
software.Description: Kid Chaos is an Action game, developed by Magnetic Fields and published by Ocean, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Kingpin: Arcade Sports Bowling
software.Description: Kingpin: Arcade Sports Bowling is a Sports game, developed and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Labyrinth Of Time, The
software.Description: The Labyrinth Of Time is an Adventure game, developed by Terra Nova Development and published by Electronic Arts, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Lamborghini American Challenge
software.Description: Lamborghini American Challenge is a Racing game, developed by Titus Software and published by Paragon Publishing, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Last Ninja 3
software.Description: Ninja 3 is here and ready to explode onto your screen with the most glorious display of graphics and animated fight sequences ever seen in this type of game. With a massive introduction sequence, incredibly detailed '3D' background graphics and a more than generous helping of all-out action, Ninja 3 displays a degree of excellence never before expierienced by even the most seasoned Ninja fan. Ninja 3 - A game of epic proportions. Feel the relism, allow yourself to witness the magical world of Ninjitsu spiritualism, expierience the mystical atmosphere of the Tibetan Temples. Remember, always remain in control of your stealth and cunning as you do battle once again with the most treacherous purveyor of evil, Kunitoki.

software.name: Legends
software.Description: Legends is an Action game, developed by Krisalis Software and published by Guildhall Leisure Services Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Lemmings
software.Description: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

software.name: Liberation
software.Description: Enter the 29th Century - and enter a dying world, commercially exploited by huge corrupt state corporations and ravaged by the ever changing climate. When Bio-corp's latest law enforcement droids malfunction and begin murdering people, a massive cover-up operation is initiated to suppress the truth. Innocent people are framed for the murders and held captive against their will, without trial or any chance of escape. YOU must take control of your four 'droids and explore the city zones in an attempt to free the captives. Search for clues, gather evidence, live above or below the corrupt 'law'; the choice is yours. Justice must prevail!

software.name: Litil Divil
software.Description: Litil Divil is an Action game, developed and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Lost Vikings, The
software.Description: Three Vikings are lost in time and space. Erik wants to run away, Balog wants to crack some skulls, Olaf want to eat. They all want to go home. But they must work together.., Discover The Lost Vikings, refreshingly original arcade action with perky puzzles and a sense of humour sharper than a Viking's axe.

software.name: Mag!!!
software.Description: Mag!!! (1996) is a Strategy game, developed by Independent Arts and published by Lifetimes, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Manchester United: Premier League Champions
software.Description: Manchester United: Premier League Champions is a Sports game, developed and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Marvin's Marvellous Adventure
software.Description: Marvin's Marvellous Adventure is an Action game, developed by Infernal Byte Systems and published by 21st Century Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Mean Arenas
software.Description: Mean Arenas is an Action game, developed by Nite Time Games and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Microcosm
software.Description: Microcosm plunges you into a dazzling world of super-realistic computer generated graphics set deep within the body of Cybertech's President: Tiron Korsby. You are the elite Cybertech agent chosen to pilot the latest hi-tech micro-submersibles on a desperate mission to find and destroy the deadly brain manipulation droid threatening Korsby's life. Experience the heart-stopping action and unparalleled cinematic imagery of over 500 megabytes of brilliant SGI graphics and an original CD-quality score and soundtrack by Rick Wakeman.

software.name: Morph
software.Description: A young boy is trapped in molecular limbo. He needs your help to return to his human form. Morris Ralph - Morph to his friends - has his life tranformed when his uncle's teleport machine goes horribly wrong! Trapped in a world of twinklog atoms, Morph can morph into four different physical states. You must guide him back to the teleport machine.

software.name: Myth: History In The Making
software.Description: Myth: History In The Making is an Action game, developed and published by System 3, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Naughty Ones
software.Description: Naughty Ones is an Action game, developed by Melon Dezign and published by Interactivision, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Nick Faldo's Championship Golf
software.Description: Nick Faldo's Championship Golf is here! Featuring two beautifully realistic 18 hole golf courses rendered with fantastic 256 color graphics. Complete practice sessions and digitized voice sound effects make you feel as if you are really on the course!

software.name: Nigel Mansell's World Championship Racing
software.Description: Become a Grand Prix legend in a race for the title of World Champion! The most exciting race driver in the world has teamed up with the greatest racing game producers to bring you the definitive Grand Prix experience. Race the full 1992 season in the superb Canon Williams Renault F1 car. Real-time coaching from Nigel Mansell himself! Experiment with the cars set up to achieve maximum performance for each of the 16 race circuits. Fast and furious race action with actual Renault F1 engine sound FX and superbly detailed graphics. The realism of the racetrack... The power and the glory!

software.name: Oscar
software.Description:
Lights! Camera! Action! It's time to meet Oscar, the newest legend of the silver screen, ready to take Tinseltown by storm... once he's used his star-power to escape the theater he's trapped in, that is!
Star in the role of a lifetime as you help Oscar navigate 4 different levels full of fun and adventure in search of a way to escape the fantasy film world he's trapped in. Will our hero be able to turn in an award-winning performance and escape from the theater, or will he be stuck on-screen forever?

software.name: Overkill & Lunar-C
software.Description: Overkill & Lunar-C is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vision (Japan) and published by Mindscape Inc., which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: PGA European Tour
software.Description: Five great PGA European Tour courses to play on with 90 new challenging holes. Featuring 60 PGA European Tour pros, five different gameplay formats, new changing weather conditions, and new Match Play!

software.name: Pierre le Chef is... Out to Lunch
software.Description: Pierre le Chef is... Out to Lunch is an Action game, developed and published by Mindscape Inc., which was released in Europe in 1994.

Release.name: Pierre le Chef is... Out to Lunch

software.name: Pinball Fantasies
software.Description: Pinball Fantasies is the official port of the classic Amiga pinball simulator originally released in 1992.

software.name: Pinball Illusions
software.Description: Pinball Illusions is an Action game, developed by Digital Illusions and published by 21st Century Entertainment, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Pinocchio
software.Description: Pinocchio is an Action game, developed by Si-Lab and published by Giunti Multimedia, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Pirates! Gold
software.Description: Pirates! Gold gives you a ship, a crew and the whole of the Caribbean to explore. Captain your hot-blooded buccaneers in thrilling adventures, plundering enemy ships and attacking wealthy cities. Then visit boisterous harbour towns, to sell your booty and divide up the spoils.

software.name: Power Drive
software.Description: Burn through blizzards in Monte Carlo at midnight or race in the blistering desert heat of Kenya. Test your rally skills through the dense forests, dizzy mountain passes and icy frozen lakes of different international courses! POWER DRIVE... drive it if you dare!

software.name: Power Games
software.Description: Power Games is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by MediaTeam, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Premiere
software.Description: Première is an eight-way scrolling platform adventure played over six levels which are represented as different movie sets. A young film editor has had his film stolen from his cutting room the night before the film's première. Your task is to search through the six different movie sets ranging from black and white, science fiction and horror levels through to cartoon, western and fantasy sets to retrieve the stolen canisters. Will you find the stolen film before the Première?

software.name: Prey: An Alien Encounter
software.Description: Prey: An Alien Encounter is a Role-Playing game, developed by Kirk Moreno and published by Almathera Systems, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Project-X: Special Edition & F17 Challenge
software.Description: Project-X: Special Edition & F17 Challenge is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Quik
software.Description: No time for fun, the carrot-locker is empty! The rabbit tribe of the Angels Meadow is in great danger, predators are ready to attack. Only one solution: find the Ultimate Seed. It's a magical seed that can produce as many carrots as anyone could ever want, for eternity. But the Ultimate Seed belongs to Quok, the good sorcerer, who lives thousands of miles away from the village. It's an emergency! Only one rabbit can get his seed back, the quickest rabbit of the Angels Meadow, QUIK, The Thunder Rabbit...

software.name: Rise of the Robots
software.Description: A revolution in combat games - featuring a unique combat intelligence system that adapts to and learns your style of play! The first game with film-quality, controllable 3D graphics. Robot attack routines choreographed by a martial arts expert. Witness the first ever morphing character to appear in a computer game! Awesome cinematic link sequences.

software.name: Roadkill
software.Description: Roadkill is a Racing game, developed by Vision Software and published by Acid Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Ryder Cup: Johnnie Walker
software.Description: Ryder Cup: Johnnie Walker is a Sports game, developed by RISC and published by Ocean, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Sabre Team
software.Description: Sabre Team is a Strategy game, developed and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Seek & Destroy
software.Description: Take control of an Apache helicopter in a series of daring missions behind enemy lines. You're fully loaded with a deadly arsenal of weapons to Seek out and Destroy hostile units! Fast and frantic 360-degree scrolling arcade action. Multi-phase missions spread out across desert, sea, snow and jungle scenarios. Varied selection of military weapons including interceptor and air-to-ground missiles. Co-pilot feature - player one pilots the Apache and player two mans the weapons. Limitless gameplay opportunites - after all 14 missions are completed, go on to new levels of difficulty.

software.name: Sensible Soccer: European Champions
software.Description: Take charge of your favourite club or national team from all over Europe in a whole host of different cup and league competitions. With all the atmostphere of European Soccer at its highest level, you (and your friends - up to 64 players can compete in competitions!) can take a squad of 16 players on to cup glory. There's no other football game quite like it!

software.name: Sensible Soccer: International Edition
software.Description: Sensible Soccer: International Edition is a Sports game, developed by Apache Software and published by Renegade, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Seven Gates of Jambala, The
software.Description: Escape from the caves of Jambala in this fun-filled run and jump game with stunning graphics and sound. You will face a labyrinth of caves which not surprisingly hide a host of inhabitants, good and bad, treasures, puzzles, magic spells and many hidden screens. If you are lucky enough to find all 7 pieces of the missing magic wand and reach the last city you will finally have the chance to escape from the labyrinth. A fascinating voyage of discovery through an unknown world of fantasy!

software.name: Shadow Fighter
software.Description: Shadow Fighter features 17 characters to fight - more than any other Amiga beat-em-up! Easy play 1 button joystick control system. Use the Blood option during a match for ultraviolence! 8MB of fighter graphics with over 150 frames per character and at least 25 different moves per fighter. Unique training mode with a specially armed puppet - The Macabre Pupazz. Featuring an average of 64 parallax levels on every screen, 80 colors and a unique digital-quality soundtrack!

software.name: Simon the Sorcerer
software.Description: What had begun as a straightforward quest to banish the Shapeshifter Witch and free the good wizard Calypso, has become hideously strange. Only this morning I was eaten by an amphibian whose table manners were quite appalling. As if that wasn't a sufficiently inconvenient start to the day, within minutes I was leered at by a'rock which flatly returned to say a word.

software.name: Skeleton Krew
software.Description: Wanna pack a BIG GUN with enough ammo to level a city? You got it...! Wanna massakre seriously psykotic Psykogenix mutants and get paid? You got it...! Wanna blast your way through the savage secret zones, deadly Krewtraps, mad n' bad buildings and hideous end-of-level Psykos comprising 6 HUMUNGOUS levels of 3D isometrik karnage - and wear a spectacularly sexy, hyper-hi-tek, Big Ordanance Neutralising Exo-skeleton, to boot? Well you got it all - but only if you join Spine, Joint and Rib, otherwise known as the SKELETON KREW, in their first outRAGEous blastfest!!

software.name: Sleepwalker
software.Description: Lee is having a restless night. Sure he's fast asleep, but that won't stop him from taking one of his nocturnal journeys! Fortunately, our sleepwalker has a courageous canine companion who will try his utmost to protect his master from coming to any harm - Lee's faithful mutt, Ralph. Lee's 4-legged friend is zapped, bashed, clobbered, pummeled, singed and squashed, but nothing will stop him from performing his dedicated duty... it's all par for the course of a night errand. These midnight meanderings take him to the most hazardous of places... the creepy graveyard, the gooky zoo, precarious construction sites and the traffic strewn city streets, but Lee's loyal rover steadfastly guards his master from all impending dangers - with painful consequences!

software.name: Sleepwalker & Pinball Fantasies
software.Description: Sleepwalker & Pinball Fantasies is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Commodore, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Soccer Kid
software.Description: Seconds before the Soccer Cup final was to begin, a marauding alien pirate swoops down and steals the Soccer Cup trophy. Gloating on his latest acquisition, the careless alien collides with an orbiting satellite. The precious trophy is smashed into five pieces which fall back to Earth. Join Soccer Kid in his quest to recover and reassemble the scattered pieces of the Soccer Cup. Grab a ball. There's no time to lose!

software.name: Soccer Superstars
software.Description: Soccer Superstars is a Sports game, developed by Flair Software and published by Flair, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Speedball 2
software.Description: It's two years since the last ball was thrown on a Speedball pitch. There are new teams, new stadia and new rules. The arena is bigger, the players are tougher and the action is faster than ever before. The challenge is this: Take control of Brutal Deluxe, the worst team in Speedball history, and turn them into champions!

software.name: Speris Legacy
software.Description: Speris Legacy is a Role-Playing game, developed by Binary Emotions and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Star Crusader
software.Description: Star Crusader is a Simulation game, developed by Human Soft and published by GameTek, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Striker
software.Description: Striker is a Sports game, developed and published by Rage Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Strip Pot
software.Description: Strip Pot is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Pixel Blue and published by Fin Soft, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Subwar 2050
software.Description: Subwar 2050 is a Strategy game, developed by Particle Systems and published by MicroProse, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Summer Olympix
software.Description: Take part in this humorous Super Sports Simulation without having to leave the comfort of your armchair. 8 great challenging events that require qualifying before you can proclaim yourself a Super Champion. Boxing, Long Jump, Swimming, Javelin, Kayak Racing, Skeet Shooting, Archery and 100 metre Sprint. Play against the computer or fellow player. Great entertainment for the whole family.

software.name: Super League Manager
software.Description: Super League Manager is a Sports game, developed and published by Audiogenic Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Super Methane Bros
software.Description: Enter Puff and Blow, Methane guns at the ready. Armed and dangerous, they must advance through over 100 levels of puzzle and mayhem, securing each level before moving on. This wonderfully graphic arcade world is loaded with traps, puzzles and fiendish, intelligent enemies. Blast and suck your way through hours of solid, mega-playable entertainment.

software.name: Super Putty
software.Description:
The game of immense playability, the character of immense pliability.
Forget about hacking, slaying, punching and kicking - its time to inflate, stretch and bounce your way through a very weird and wonderful world.
The deranged wizard Dozzledaze is selling your fellow Putty people to hoards of kids around the cosmos packed as the finest Bubblegum, and business is booming.
Take on the shape shifting form of Super Putty and thwart this evil crime.
Rescue the robot guards and send them safely for repairs on Putty Moon and always stay on slithery step ahead of the wacky wizard's henchman. Absorb anything animals or vegetable to keep yourself pliable and mould into the form of your enemies. Use their powers to your advantage.

software.name: Super Skidmarks
software.Description: Super Skidmarks is a Racing game, developed and published by Acid, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Super Stardust
software.Description: There's a way out there... and it's coming your way. Gigantic meteors hurtle toward Earth, promising mass death and destruction unless you can stop them. Warring aliens thunder through the starbelts, intent on taking advantage of mankind's stretched resources. You are the world's leading aerial combat pilot and it is you who must take control of the Panther PX-2. It is you who must not only blow apart every threatening meteor but you must also repel the alien forces. Fear is for the weak. Mercy is for the foolish. Power, strength and victory are the only words which can mean anything to you... have you got what it takes?

software.name: Super Street Fighter II Turbo
software.Description: Super Street Fighter II Turbo is an Action game, developed by Human Soft and published by GameTek, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Superfrog
software.Description: Curses! The evil old witch has done it this time... she's gone and turned the Prince of the Magic Kingdom into a bright green frog and made off with hs loved on... Sometimes life, even in the Magic Kindom, is just not fair! But life by the riverside was not to be all doom and gloom for our once regal, yet now green and warty chum... As luck would have it, a strange and powerful elixir (which goes by the name of Lucozade™ in modern times) floats down the stream and catches his attention... Intrigued, our soon-to-be-hero takes a huge swig, after a few minor explosions he becomes the legend that soon will be... SUPERFROG! With boundless courage and new heights of determination, he sets off toward the magic Forest with three objectives in mind. One, to get back his girl, two, vanquish the curse and three, give that nasty old witch just what she deserves!

software.name: Surf Ninjas
software.Description: Surf Ninjas is an Action game, developed and published by Microvalue, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Syndicate
software.Description: Mission Briefing: Sources indicate that a rival syndicate has developed a dangerous new computer program and our research boys want it. In the year 2096, the world is divided into regions controlled by a handful of massive corporations, struggling for dominance. Prepare yourself for the ultimate corporate takeover!

software.name: Theme Park
software.Description: Theme Park is a Strategy game, developed by Bullfrog Productions and published by Mindscape Inc., which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Thomas The Tank Engine's Pinball
software.Description: Thomas The Tank Engine's Pinball is an Action game, developed by Spidersoft and published by Alternative Software, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Top Gear 2
software.Description: Top Gear 2 is a Racing game, developed and published by Gremlin Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Total Carnage
software.Description: Total Carnage is an Action game, developed and published by ICE, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Trivial Pursuit
software.Description: The all-time best-selling trivia game comes to life in this state-of-the-art multimedia edition. The object is the same... be the first to earn 6 "pies" by correctly answering questions in the classic six categories. And the presentation is... LIVE! In the classic game, roll the on-screen die and move around the board answering questions. In the Fast Game, cut right to the questions! To win, give a correct answer in each of these six categories: People & Places, Sports & Leisure, History, Arts & Entertainment, Science & Nature, and Wild Card.

software.name: Trolls
software.Description: TROLLS is packed with loads of action, collectables and surprises. It's a game you won't want to stop playing and it's just like having your very own coin-op arcade machine.

software.name: UFO: Enemy Unknown
software.Description: UFO: Enemy Unknown is a Strategy game, developed by Mythos Software and published by MicroProse, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Ultimate Body Blows
software.Description: Experience arcade quality action in this incredible, all action beat'em-up! Select your character from the 22 available and go for the glittering Body Blows crown!

software.name: Ultimate Body Blows & Project-X: Special Edition
software.Description: Ultimate Body Blows & Project-X: Special Edition is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Team 17, which was released in Europe in 1994.

Release.name: Ultimate Body Blows & Project-X: Special Edition

software.name: Universe
software.Description: Encounter weird alien worlds and their even wierder alien inhabitants! Guide Boris on an action-packed chase across the gulfs of space to find a fabled last star. Help him find the key to defeating the evil Golden King who rules his UNIVERSE!

software.name: Vital Light
software.Description: Vital Light is a Puzzle game, developed by Efecto Caos and published by Millenium Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Wembley International Soccer
software.Description: Wembley International Soccer is a Sports game, developed and published by Audiogenic Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Whale's Voyage
software.Description: Explore the Alien planets of the 24th century, with their sinister worlds and cities inhabited by strange sometimes violent people. Learn to tell friend from foe, as you try to outwit traders with your merchandise, the competition can be instense, but the rewards great, as you strive to financially secure your race. Select your genetically created crew members and take off in your "Rustbucket" of a spaceship to the other solar planets, whilst battling against maurauding pirate ships that will try to hinder your trading progress.

software.name: Whizz
software.Description: ONE, TWO, THREE D! Whizz takes you into the third dimension. 3D perspective Whizz is the new generation of game that all platform addicts have been waiting for!

software.name: Wild Cup Soccer
software.Description: Wild Cup Soccer is a Sports game, developed by Teque Interactive and published by Millenium Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Will Bridge: Initiation Junior
software.Description: Will Bridge: Initiation Junior is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Will-Bridge and published by Loridim, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Word Construction Set
software.Description: Word Construction Set is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Lascelles, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Worms
software.Description: Worms is an ultra-fast-paced game of team strategy for up to 16 players. It's a little bit "Lemmings™" and a lotta bit "Terminator™"... only more pink and squishy, with bazookas, homing missiles and cluster bombs blasting the screen in an unrelenting fury, only the moist can survive!

software.name: Zool 2
software.Description: Zool 2 is an Action game, developed by Warp Factory and published by Gremlin Graphics, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Zool: Ninja of the ''Nth'' Dimension
software.Description: Once every year, the games world is rocked by a game so stunning, so fast, so colorful, so big, so demanding, so mega, so awesome, so varied , so incredible, and so full of fabulous features and unexpected treats, that everybody just looks at it and says "THAT'S IT!" This year, ZOOL, THE NINJA FROM THE Nth DIMENSION, is definitely "IT!"
